hero.title: Ready to outhustle the competition?
hero.subtitle: Design-Driven Digital Agency
hero.shortDescription: We exist to show you how to stand out from the crowd and make a lasting impression online.

about.description: Media Control Agency is a design-driven digital agency that was born out of a love for design and a passion for creating. We specialize in crafting unique, user-centric digital experiences that captivate audiences and elevate brands. Our mission is to help businesses like yours build faster, connect better, and stand out in the digital world.

case_studies.title: Our recent projects.
case_studies.subtitle: See how we've helped businesses transform and grow their digital presence.

project.description: We've designed and developed a custom e-commerce website for Plus 44, a streetwear fashion brand based in the Netherlands. We've also created and implemented a paid advertising strategy to increase the brand's awareness and sales.

challenges.title: Plus 44 needed a website that would represent their brand, values and overall image. They also needed a digital marketing to increase their brand awareness and accessibility.
description: Implementing smart solutions like IDeal payment

project.solution: Media Control Agency provided a tailored solution using Shopify, custom code and 3D modeling, succesfully implementing the client's vision and desired features.
project.result: A unique and modern website that represents the brand's identity and values, and a successful paid advertising campaign that increased the brand's awareness and accessibility.

project.description: We've optimized the website of Allersnelste Nanie, a Dutch electra company, for search engines. We've also redesigned and developed their website to improve user experience and increase conversions.

challenges.title: Allersnelste Nanie needed a update for their website to improve user experience and increase conversions. It was our task to optimize the website for search engines and improve the overall performance.

project.solution: Media Control Agency reviewed the already exisitng website, came up with a tailored strategy and implemented it. We've optimized the website for search engines, improved the user experience and increased the overall performance.
project.result: A fully optimized website for multiple different location with improved user experience and increased conversions.

project.description: We've fully redesigned and developed the website of A1 Maatwerk, a Dutch contractor. We've also optimized the website for search engines to improve user experience and increase conversions.

challenges.title: A1 Maatwerk needed a update for their website to improve user experience, increase conversions and improve the general outdated design. It was our task to design a new website based on the already exisitng brand identity, develop it and optimize it for search engines.
description: Redesigning the website based on existing brand identity
Implementing a new design and user experience
Developing the website using modern technologies
Integrating the website with a content management system

project.solution: Media Control Agency reviewed the already exisitng website, came up with a custom design and development plan. We've optimized the website for search engines, improved the user experience and increased the overall performance.
project.result: A fully optimized website with modern design and user experience, improved performance, increased conversions and integrated content management system.

project.description: A new business, Pod Skrzydlami, needed a full branding and web development solution. We created a new brand identity, designed and developed a custom website, and optimized it for search engines.

challenges.title: Pod Skrzydlami is a Dutch accounting company that needed a full branding and web development solution. It was our task to create a new brand identity, design and develop a custom website, and optimize it for search engines. We started by creating a new logo, color palette, typography and overall brand identity. Then we designed and developed a custom website that represents the brand's values and identity.
description: Developing the website using modern technologies
Integrating the website with a content management system

project.solution: Media Control Agency provided a tailored solution using custom code, Adobe XD and ChatGPT. We created a new brand identity, designed and developed a custom website, and optimized it for search engines.
project.result: A fully branding and web development solution that includes a new brand identity, custom website and optimized for search engines. The website is user-friendly, modern and represents the brand's values and identity.

process.title: Our simple 3-step process to skyrocket your business.
process.subtitle: We believe in a design and development process that is not only efficient but also effective. Time is money, and we make sure to deliver high-quality results in a timely manner.

steps.title: Concept & Strategy
steps.description: We dive deep into understanding your brand, goals, and target audience. Together, we outline a clear strategy that lays the foundation for an impactful digital presence.

steps.title: Design & Development
steps.description: Our team translates the strategy into stunning, user-centric designs and seamlessly brings them to life. We ensure every pixel and line of code reflects your brand's uniqueness.

steps.title: Launch & Grow
steps.description: After thorough testing, we launch your project with confidence. Our partnership doesn‚Äôt end there ‚Äì we provide ongoing support and enhancements to help your digital presence thrive.

list.title: Product Design
list.description: Craft sleek, user-focused designs that bring your ideas to life. We combine creativity with strategic thinking to create products that stand out and captivate your audience.

list.title: Web Development
list.description: Build modern, responsive websites that deliver seamless user experiences. From concept to launch, we create high-performing websites tailored to your brand.

list.title: App Development
list.description: Transform your vision into dynamic, user-friendly mobile apps. We design and develop apps that are intuitive, engaging, and optimized for performance across all devices.

list.title: MVP Building
list.description: Launch quickly with a Minimum Viable Product that captures your core idea. We help you test, validate, and refine your product with agility and speed.

list.title: E-commerce
list.description: Boost your sales with a custom-built e-commerce platform that‚Äôs tailored for growth. We create seamless shopping experiences that convert visitors into loyal customers.

FAQ.title: Still Have Questions?
FAQ.subtitle: We've gathered some of the most common questions our clients ask. Feel free to reach out to us directly if you need more information.

faq_tiles.title: Who is behind Media Control Agency?
faq_tiles.description: Media Control Agency is led by a passionate designer and developer duo with over 6+ years of experience in the industry.

faq_tiles.title: What is included in your plans?
faq_tiles.description: Our plans are comprehensive and include everything from initial concept design, website/app development, revisions, to final deployment. We ensure a seamless experience with unlimited requests, revisions, and ongoing support to bring your ideas to life.

faq_tiles.title: Why choose us over hiring a full-time designer and developer?
faq_tiles.description: Hiring us offers flexibility, expertise, and cost-efficiency. You'll gain access to a team of experienced professionals at a fraction of the cost of hiring full-time staff, without the long-term commitment. Plus, our diverse skills mean you get design, development, and strategy in one package.

faq_tiles.title: What if I'm not satisfied with the design or result?
faq_tiles.description: Your satisfaction is our priority. We offer unlimited revisions to ensure that the final design or product meets your expectations. We‚Äôll work closely with you every step of the way to guarantee that you‚Äôre happy with the outcome.

faq_tiles.title: How quickly will I receive my project?
faq_tiles.description: We pride ourselves on efficient delivery times. Typically, we provide an average turnaround of 2-3 business days per request, with larger projects having tailored timelines. We‚Äôll keep you informed at every stage to ensure timely completion.

faq_tiles.title: What if I only have a single request?
faq_tiles.description: No problem at all! We offer a 'Single Project' plan specifically designed for clients who have one-off design or development needs. This allows you to benefit from our expertise without committing to a long-term partnership.

faq_tiles.title: Do you offer refunds if I'm not satisfied with the service?
faq_tiles.description: We are committed to delivering high-quality results, and while refunds are not typically offered, we will work tirelessly to ensure you are satisfied with the final product. Your happiness and success are our top priorities.

footer_card.title: Let's bring your brand to new heights.
footer_card.subtitle: Book a free 15-minute discovery call with Media Control Agency and find out if we‚Äôre the perfect match (spoiler: we definitely are)!

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.headline: General Terms and Conditions
paragraphs: For the initiation of business relations, the processing of orders and the execution of contracts between Media Control Agency and customers as well as potential customers (both hereinafter referred to as "Business Partners"), the following applies in addition to our privacy policy with regard to the exchange of information and data (hereinafter referred to as "Confidential Information"):

1. Media Control Agency and ‚ÄúBusiness Partners‚Äù (the "Parties") will at any time take all possible and reasonable measures to ensure information security and protection of sensitive information. The parties are obliged to secrecy in respect of the following terms (hereinafter referred to as ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù).

2. Media Control Agency and its ‚ÄúBusiness Partner‚Äù have an interest in sharing information, checking data and facilitating discussions. Both parties will attach great importance to the mutual protection of information and will treat it confidentially at all times.
3. ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù includes, but is not limited to:
confidentialList: (b) information regarding personnel, customers and suppliers;
(c) inventions, processes, methods, products, patent applications and other intellectual property rights;
(d) specifications, drawings, sketches, models, samples, tools, computer programs, technical information, software codes and other corresponding or related information.
moreParagraphs: 4. Each party will mark ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù as protected and confidential in case of doubt. In the case of information disclosed orally or in written materials that are not marked as confidential, secrecy shall only apply in cases where it is obviously a matter of secrets or insofar as the necessity for confidentiality is pointed out subsequently. Notification of the protected and confidential nature of the information may be given orally, by e-mail, in written correspondence or, if necessary, by other means of communication.

5. As soon as the receiving party ("Recipient") is informed of the proprietary and confidential nature of the ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù disclosed by the other party, the ‚ÄúRecipient‚Äù shall refrain from disclosing such ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù to other third parties without the prior written consent of the disclosing Party. The ‚ÄúRecipient‚Äù shall protect such ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù from inadvertent disclosure to a third party, using the same care and diligence as it uses to protect its own proprietary and confidential information, but in no event less than reasonable care. ‚ÄúRecipient‚Äù shall ensure that any of its employees, officers, directors or agents who have access to the ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù disclosed under these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù are informed of its proprietary and confidential nature and are required to comply with these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù. The ‚ÄúRecipient‚Äù of ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù disclosed under these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù shall promptly notify the disclosing party of any further disclosure of such ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù in violation of this Agreement or of any subpoena or other legal process requiring the submission or disclosure of such ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù. Media Control Agency is entitled to pass on ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù to particularly trustworthy subcontractors for the processing of orders from the ‚ÄúBusiness Partner‚Äù and/or implementation/execution of the contract with the ‚ÄúBusiness Partner‚Äù. These subcontractors are bound to secrecy comparable to the conditions set out in these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù.

6. All ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù disclosed under these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù shall be and remain the property of the disclosing Party, and nothing in this Agreement shall be construed to grant or transfer any rights in such ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù to the other Party. The ‚ÄúRecipient‚Äù shall comply with any request by the disclosing Party to promptly return or destroy all copies of the ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù disclosed under these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù and any notes relating to ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù.

7. Nothing in these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù shall be construed to limit the right of either Party to independently develop or acquire products without using the other Party's ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù. The disclosing Party acknowledges that the recipient may currently or in the future be developing information internally or may receive from other parties information similar to the ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù. Nothing in these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù prohibits ‚ÄúRecipient‚Äù from developing or having developed products, concepts, systems or techniques similar to or competing with the products, concepts, systems or techniques considered or contained in the ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù, provided that ‚ÄúRecipient‚Äù does not breach any of its obligations under these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù in connection with such development.

8. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the parties agree that information shall not be considered ‚ÄúConfidential Information‚Äù and the recipient shall not be required to keep such information confidential if such information:
exceptionsList: (a) is already known to the recipient because it has been disclosed to him by a third party, without that third party being under any obligation of confidentiality to the disclosing party;
(b) is or becomes publicly known without the recipient, its employees, officers, directors or agents having acted unlawfully;
(c) is developed independently by the recipient and without reference to the confidential information disclosed herein;
(d) is authorized for release (and only to the extent authorized by the disclosing party);
(e) if disclosure is required by the law, court or governmental authority.
finalParagraphs: 9. Nothing in these ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù shall be construed to constitute an agency, partnership, joint venture or similar relationship between the ‚ÄúParties‚Äù.

10. These ‚ÄúTerms‚Äù contain the entire agreement between the parties regarding secrecy and in no way creates an obligation for either party to disclose any information to the other party or otherwise.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.headline: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
paragraphs: The following Privacy Policy specifies rules for saving and accessing data on Users' Devices using the Website...
The following Privacy Policy is an integral part of the Website Regulations...
definitionsList: Service ‚Äì the website "Media Control Agency" operating at https://media-control-agency.com/
External service ‚Äì websites of partners, service providers or recipients cooperating with the Administrator
Website / Data Administrator ‚Äì The company "Media Control Agency", located at Narcis 7...
User ‚Äì a natural person for whom the Administrator provides services electronically...
Cookies (cookies) ‚Äì text data collected in files on the User's Device
moreParagraphs: Pursuant to Art. 37 of the GDPR, the Controller has not appointed a Data Protection Officer.
In matters relating to data processing, please contact the Administrator directly.
cookieTypes: Internal cookies ‚Äì files saved and read by the Website
External cookies ‚Äì files saved and read by third-party scripts
securityParagraphs: The Administrator uses every effort to protect data stored in cookies...
purposesOfCookies: Improving and facilitating access to the Website
Personalization of the Website for Users
thirdPartyAccess: Hosting companies providing services to the Administrator
dataProcessingRules: Personal data will not be transferred outside the EU...
Anonymous data may be used for profiling...
retentionPeriods: Data is stored for the duration of service provision and deleted within 30 days thereafter.
Anonymous data may be retained indefinitely for statistics.
contactInfo: Postal: Media Control Agency, Narcis 7, 1619 BC Andijk, Netherlands
requirements: Restricting cookies may cause Website features to malfunction.
The Administrator is not responsible for such malfunctions.
privacy.externalLinksWarning: External links may pose risks. The Administrator is not responsible for their content.
policyChanges: The Administrator may change the Privacy Policy without notice for anonymous data.
Users will be notified via email if changes affect personal data.
